description:
Identifying single molecules from fluorescence images obtained by a camera and obtain their location and intensity has
many applications. We have developed an efficient mathematical algorithm for this task and translate it into computer
software. Our algorithm are fast, stable and accurate comparing other programs to do the similar task. We have used our
software in several scientific research areas, such as tracking receptors in live cells, super resolution fluorescence
microscopy, and counting mRNA copies in cells.
name: flifish
